product_name: CamelBak RaceBak Hydration Vest - Women's - 70 fl. oz.
long_description: The CamelBak RaceBak vest is 1 part hydration reservoir and 1 part performance apparel-perfect for women's endurance sports. Wear it underneath your jersey. HydroPouch(TM) is an integrated reservoir compartment that encapsulates a 70 fl. oz. reservoir in a manner that supports and stabilizes the water weight on the back. Vest is made from soft, chafe-free compression fabric that self-adjusts to comfortably hold and stabilize water reservoir and conform to the body like a second skin. Fabric also dissipates moisture and dries quickly for cool and comfortable performance; zipper allows easy on and off. Mesh insulated back panel insert keeps your back cool and comfortable and insulates the water in the reservoir. Includes an insulated tube cover to keep the water in the drinking tube cool and palatable. Reservoir is made from a strong polyurethane film for tensile strength and burst resistance. Big Bite(TM) valve is ergonomically positioned for easy drinking; handy HydroLock(TM) securely shuts off water flow. Use the CamelBak RaceBak vest for cycling, running and other endurance sports.
short_description: The CamelBak RaceBak vest is 1 part hydration reservoir and 1 part performance apparel-perfect for women's endurance sports. Wear it underneath your jersey.
